idioms.meaning: don't hasten into action when you have doubts

lessons.japanese: 金の延べ棒１本を盗まれた。
lessons.english: We had a bar of gold stolen.

lessons.japanese: わが戦闘機の延べ出撃機数は平均１日４３０機であった。
lessons.english: Our fighters averaged 430 missions a day.

lessons.english: The payment will be deferred for two years.

lessons.japanese: 契約では３年の延べ払いということになっている。
lessons.english: The contract provides for a deferred payment over three years.
